com.fortify.pub.serialization

Class ValidatingObjectReader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortify.pub.serialization.ValidatingObjectReader<T>

  • public class ValidatingObjectReader<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper for ValidatingObjectInputStream and DeserializableClass simplifying safe Java object de-serialization.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ValidatingObjectReader(java.io.InputStream inputStream, DeserializableClass<? extends T> deserializableClass)
      Constructs a new reader of object T from inputStream.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ValidatingObjectReader

        public ValidatingObjectReader(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                              DeserializableClass<? extends T> deserializableClass)
        Constructs a new reader of object T from inputStream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - an input stream with data of serialized Java object
        deserializableClass - a specification of class to be read

    • Method Detail

      • readObject

        public T readObject()
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Safely reads Java object from input stream passed to constructor.
        Returns:
        an instance de-serialized object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when thrown by underlying ValidatingObjectInputStream
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when thrown by underlying ValidatingObjectInputStream
        java.lang.ClassCastException - when de-serialized top-level class does not match deserializable class specification passed to the constructor
